FuncDef: The reset traffic-segment statistics command clears EPG statistics. The reset traffic-segment statistics command clears EPG statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: reset traffic-segment statistics { segment-id <id-value> | segment-name <name> } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Microsegmentation ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535.

Specifies a microsegmentation name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, starting with a letter.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of characters. The value is a slot ID.
